title: Chat Restricted, Honor Demoted, Reward Removed ... for this?! .. Why?
body:
in a match where the adc initiated a war on words, my top laner was afk for 88% of the match, and team straight up refused to communicate i find the punishment (which shouldn't be applicable under those circumstances) is far too harsh.

here is the chat log:

Game 1 
USALuck: prep mind for defensive opportunist bot lane trist 
USALuck: oh LOL 
USALuck: ok 
USALuck: LOL 
USALuck: counter dmg 
USALuck: alkthought 
USALuck: thanks for heal 
USALuck: didnt need 
USALuck: gj with farm tristy 
USALuck: once we get a top laner and ajg 
USALuck: we'll be on top 
USALuck: huh? 
USALuck: you mad @ what i just said? 
USALuck: really? 
USALuck: the internet is cool 
USALuck: oh? 
USALuck: i mean 
USALuck: i just read an insult

USALuck: guess it is flame 
USALuck: nope

USALuck: you're still doing it 
USALuck: just chill

USALuck: mid goes top

USALuck: great rotation 
USALuck: YES 
USALuck: why is lux fed 
USALuck: everything is fine 
USALuck: but that is too much 
USALuck: with our circumstance 
USALuck: unluckyt 
USALuck: if we had trist 
USALuck: that mightve been game changer 
USALuck: i know 
USALuck: i said unlucky 
USALuck: again 
USALuck: you must be an XX choromosome 
USALuck: cause you take shit too personally 
USALuck: just ff 
USALuck: and requeu 
USALuck: agree? 
USALuck: our kd's could suffer more 
USALuck: or we could win 
USALuck: ez 
USALuck: one 
USALuck: k 
USALuck: waste time it is 
USALuck: hell yeah 
USALuck: a bunch of word eathers 
USALuck: WE LOST 
USALuck: literally cant 
USALuck: too much deficit 
USALuck: just requeue 
USALuck: F THE FUCK 
USALuck: F 
USALuck: IM DONE 
USALuck: pls 
USALuck: this is retarded 
USALuck: FF 
USALuck: WE'RE DONE 
USALuck: OBJ 
USALuck: CONTROL 
USALuck: goodnight 
USALuck: im done 
USALuck: team not there when we need them 
USALuck: you guys clean 
USALuck: then we have no objs 
USALuck: im FUCKING DONE 
USALuck: wasting my time 
USALuck: bye 
USALuck: ez game 
USALuck: report us all 
USALuck: morg toxic im afk gnar afk 
USALuck: bye

USALuck: i wanna play the game

USALuck: and PLAY AGAIN 
USALuck: not the one that's not a real match 
USALuck: you guys dont even rotate 
USALuck: for grouping 
USALuck: gg 
USALuck: coulda saved me 10 fucking minutes 
USALuck: learn

> and team straight up refused to communicate i find the punishment 

Refused to communicate lol. I would have muted your annoying ass the moment you started bitching. And some of your teammtes probably did so aswell

My thoughts on the Chat Log Itself and my thoughts on Riot Games' new banning system.

I JUST WANTED TO LEAVE THIS MATCH for a more peaceful place.)

USALuck: report us all

I also didn't leave cause its my belief that if the team still truly wants to tryhard despite impossible odds then i DON'T QUIT ... damn my Righteous Values)

I'LL BE DAMNED!

USALuck: gg (All Chatted the Enemy Team a well Deserved GG. they played as a team and continuously punished my own for not playing as one)

USALuck: coulda saved me 10 fucking minutes 
USALuck: learn (You gotta know when to hold 'em know when to fold 'em know when to walk away, know when to run!) ... I SHOULD'VE RAN maybe id only deal with a faulty leaver buster instead of a FAULTY Chat Restrict Bot that takes all the "Reward" Incentive and Hard Grinded Honor to make it a "[Beep Bop Beep Boop Toxic Report] :: fuck you have a nice day

I'm Gonna go on a Hiatus from this game and play the superior Overwatch. You can voice chat and express yourself freely. learn from your mistakes from said expressional critiques, and maybe even grow a chest hair from not being SUBMISSIVELY DAUNTED into chatting like a, as Videogamedunkey had once wisely said, "pussy ass baby preschool time" CHILD.

Get Right Riot Games. Get Right.

>USALuck: you must be an XX choromosome
USALuck: cause you take shit too personally (straight gamer talk and overall a Nonsense joke. .. i mean wtf does being a chromosome even mean?! if LoL bans for this i don't want to play LoL)

Ya, you're calling the player a girl. Don't sugar coat it.

If you feel you have to “justify" every other line, that should say something to you.

If you abuse your team like this in Overwatch, be it in voice chat or in text chat, you will get banned as well. In fact, Overwatch has such a big problem with toxicity that they are beginning to take ideas and parts of Riot’s banning system for their own.

> [{quoted}](name=USALuck,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=x3dhBvaL,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-10-26T17:01:31.566+0000)
>
> USALuck: you must be an XX choromosome 
> USALuck: cause you take shit too personally (straight gamer talk and overall a Nonsense joke. .. i mean wtf does being a chromosome even mean?! if LoL bans for this i don't want to play LoL)
>

Genetically, chromosomes determine your assigned sex at birth. Without delving into all the whatnot (I'm sure you know what I'm talking about), receiving one X and one Y chromosome means you're male, and receiving two X chromosomes means you're female. There's other stuff that can happen in regards to genetic defects that can alter these results, but the fact of the matter is that OP basically said "You must be a girl, because you take [expletive] too personally." This could easily be construed as misogynistic hate speech. Riot has 0 tolerance for hate speech.

You may be interested to know that Dunkey quit playing league after getting a single 2 week ban.

Frankly, I'm surprised it took that long. Guy was funny to watch, but I'd have hated playing with his flaming tendencies.
Am i the only one wondering why is he not perma banned ?
DUDE UR TOXIC STOP THINKINNG YOU ARE THE MORAL POLICE AND GET OFF YOUR HIGH HORSE.
Im not, never will be, never will even get slightest hint of ban, chat restriction or whatever nowadays happens. But you on other hand got perma banned and i can see why.

I mean, so first of all, I highlighted what might be considered toxic, rude, and/or unnecessary. You're generally being a jerk, typing all in caps, threatening to AFK, insulting either your teammates, opponents or both with F-bombs. My guess is that there are either more games like this one or that you've been punished before. 

In the future, if you get a bad game, chock it up to being just that: a bad game. Get out, go for a walk if you need to calm down, get off the computer, look at cat pictures. Do something to chill out. For your sake I'm hoping you only got a chat restriction and you can learn to ease up on telling your teammates to F-off. If they're not doing something you like, point it out once, don't belabor, try to encourage where you can. Have a good one.
When your poll doesn't go as planned
You have 102 messages. Games last an average of 30 minutes. Even making this a 45 minute game, that's one message every 26 seconds on average. Think about that.

What do you mean why did you get banned? You obviously cursed everyone out, threatened them when they didnt FF, made a pretty sexist comment, begged for reports, and afked.

You honestly dont understand why you got banned? Seriously?

>and team straight up refused to communicate

The proper response to toxic behavior is to mute and report. That would explain why they didn't communicate. You were muted.
I am not sure how to vote. You probably shouldn't have said some of those things, but I understand why you did. I would not want you punished I think, if this is atypical behavior.
